content.detailedDescription: Friend and i was talking outside looking at the sky and witnessed
content.summary: 2 star like  objects flying by changing speeds

content.detailedDescription: It happened be then 10:00 to 10:45 pm . there was a loud humming sound. it lasted approximately 5 to 8 second. we thought it was the garage opening, cause it sounded close.  but it was unusual, unlike anything we ever heard before. it was so loud it caused alarm. so we immediately went outside. several neighbors went outside to expressing concern and alarm. the dogs in the neighborhood were barking then they got very quiet. this is when we looked directly north of the home and saw in the direct path of my home and my neighbor's home some very low lights in the sky, amber in color and changing color with some reds. we watched it for about 1 minute. it was stationary at this time, then it started to move to the west very slowly without sound. it was about 1/2 mile away at this time. shortly after i went to the 7/11 directly north about half a mile from me. asked the attendant did he hear any strange noise. he said yes, and all the power went out just in the 7/11. this would put the objects path directly over the 7/11 at the time of seeing the lights. the attendant said the computers all failed and nothing was working.  after the lights dimmed the object could not be seen any longer. heard a helicopter about 15 minutes after the object was seen. did not see the helicopter. i found this strange cause in the beach community it is extremely quiet we do not get air traffic so late.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Humming  sound, then silence, then silent lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw as i was coming home while driving, a ufo hovering over a neighbors house about 400 feet up. i stopped the car to look, there was still plenty of light in the sky but the sun was at a descending angle allowing the light to shire sideways on the craft and actually making it more visible. i saw a dark possibly black triangular craft hovering perfectly still and making no noise. there where 3 indented lines from each corner to a center orb or dome shape protruding from the bottom. in each corn at the end of each of these indentations was a red light the center dome was white and luminescent. the triangle hovered of a few moments then turned and accelerated away. it started slow but very quickly accelerated faster and faster, from the time it started moving to the time it sped up to what i could perceive as full speed only a few seconds passed, maybe 7 seconds. the sighting took place at the top of a hill and allowed a view distance of a few miles at the elevation the ufo was at, and from the time it reached full speed while accelerating away it few that distance of a few miles and moved out of sight in an additional 5 seconds. i was in the military and have see many high speed aircraft, including blue angel f-18 and hornets and i have never seen any man made aircraft that moved that fast and made no noise while hovering, the craft did not maneuver anything more then turning and flying off in a straight line, but it was definitely faster then what man made air craft i have seen and i have seen quite a few military craft. unfortunately i did not have a camera with me, (of course... :-( ). i did however find a photo that some one else took of the exact same type of object . this photo is not a picture i took but it does perfectly illustrate what is looked like, the picture i found  was taken by another person who saw the same object some where else and apparently is the same craft i saw. i have added it to this file.
content.summary: Ufo hovering over house then flew off

content.detailedDescription: I was walking north on brigham road in st albans vermont at 9:40, i noticed sonething caught my eye moving fairly close i look up and notice floating along like a fire ball glowing yellowish orange flame like colors and it was the size of a toyota prius lt didnt stay perfectly round it changed shape and it was moving fast and irratic back and forth then stoped dead above trees then floated down like a leaf shot about ten feet over my head i tried shooting a picture but my phone wouldnt work i was screaming ufo oh my god a ufo at the top of my lungsso people would come outside to see and then itstarted to head north slowly it went to color white and shot straight up heading north it wasnt a ball was an odd shape i finally got a picture of it from a distance it was headed back towards space i got the shot and it looks like a dot till you zoom in and you xsn se the shape and the color white and thats about it, i didn't see it again after that!!
content.summary: Looked like ball flames that moved eraticly all over the place moved like nothong ive ever seen, it seemed like it chsnged shape and when it yook of it went from yellowish orange flames to solid white and shot strait up got a photograph of it leaving

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to ohio from va. and was less then 10min from home when i noticed to my left "south" in a field a red turned white light ascending @2:00 and went out. this is an open corn field with nothing around. i drove another half mile then turned south and then noticed an emensely bright white light going same direction a quater mile to my left then i turned west and looked back and it was still visible. i drove another two miles before turning left "south" again and seen the light heading south west. i continue driving a quarter before turning into my driveway and as i backed up to my garage "facing south" i noticed the light "floating" as it seemed to slowly come my direction. i watched it for 2-3 min before remembering i'd purchased a camcorder that arrived while i was in va. and went and grabbed it and recorded it for quite somd time. this was thee brightest white light i'd ever seen in the sky and was amazed when i zoomed in and started to record. i've attached 4 stills off the flip out screen from my phone cam, so a pic from a pic. i appologize on not uploading the video as im in transistion of moving and havent transferred the video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Waaaay too much to say here sorry.

content.detailedDescription:
March 6th is when i saw these things coming through my front door. they've been doing this since 3/6/14. i was woke up from white noise cranked through my stereo, which was on an odd am station, which i never use. all my electronics were on the blink so i reset it all. then out of the corner of my eye i saw the first one flying about 4 ft off the ground and cruising up the walkway straight into my front door and into my house. i have it on video, outside and inside as they come and go. they're very strange behaving entities.
i have hours of video. its freaked me out. these things are real.
content.summary: This is ongoing: bright shapeshifting entities are coming into my house. i have hours of video.

content.detailedDescription: On 09/13/2014 at approximately 1:00pm while driving north on foster street at around 12700 south i observed to the north east approximately 1 mile away and approximately 400 feet in the air an oval shaped craft creme collored, non metallic approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter.  i watched the craft flying in a northerly direction maybe 30 miles an hour. i watched it for approximately 20 seconds max where at which point it dissapeared. weather condition at the time was clear with a few small clouds.
content.summary: Oval creme colored craft seen on 09/13/2014 at approximately 1:00pm in overland park, kansas.

content.detailedDescription:
my friend and i loved star gazing, we enjoyed it very much.. we stopped telling the story because people just thought we lied, but today i needed awnsers. things are happening to me, and i seriously want help i dont want to go.. 
   it all started like this..
      my friend and i were stargazing usually nothing unusual. we have had things messing with our phones and such, not out of the ordinary. we were laying in my driveway at around 11:30.. we seen a couple airplanes fly by, helicopters. but, you can hear them around here. before we decided to go inside we looked up, and it was barely just hovering over the church. i was terrified. she on the other hand wasnt. we didnt run, we observed. it was in the shape of a triangle.... blinking lights everywhere! it was slow, and just hovered over us, like someone who drives by looking at you in their cars.... no sound, me and my friend just staring in awe going " oh my god " we couldnt catch any images or anything! it just... went by slowly... like it was teasing us.. it is scary for me... i have a lot more information that any researchers might need.... i just need awnsers and to be assured im ok, i have way too many weird experiences to be dealing with... i cant, im going insane.
content.summary: Right above us, closer than expected. no sounds, nothing.. seen for 5 minutes, it wasnt human, i have a witness to my case. she is not hard to get contact from.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were hanging out out front my house looking at the sky like we always do we noticed a lot of really fast moving planes that were clearly not passenger planes because when they flew over us they immediately turned out there head lights out and just left white blinking lights on the a disk shaped object came towards us then when it was above us it changed to a triton shaped object then it passed and then we went in
content.summary: Triton like

content.detailedDescription: Higher than the moon.  it almost looks like a star.   it has lights instead of it lights in side of it.  red, blue, green and changes shapes.  moves in small increments.   have been watching it for three or four nights.   sitting in the sky.  it stays there.  it does not leave.   sat at 12 o'clock position above the moon.  the light is in the sky between 10 p.M. and 12 a.M.  the object moved west to east.  it was much higher than the moon.    saw this object three nights in a row and around the same time.
content.summary: Saw object in sky had multiple colored lights

content.detailedDescription: At the time of these sightings, i lived in westminster, just north of huntington beach and east of the seal beach naval weapons station. at about 1:00 am on 12/27/13, from my backyard, i was observing a star-like light, in the southwestern sky, through my 50x binoculars.  i moved to my front yard for a better look. the light did not move, but flashed multiple colors, much like some stars do, but something kept me fixed on it, not convinced it was a star.   i video recorded with my camcorder for awhile, then went back to my binoculars.  suddenly i observed it move a short distance north, then stop, then with lightning speed it flew west, leaving a blue flame-like trail, and disappeared.  within seconds, it reappeared, flew back to where it had moved to, then back to it's original position.  i decided to take a still picture of it with my camcorder to see if i could get more detail.  i focused and zoomed in on it.  as soon as i did, i saw an orange saucer appear to the left of the star-like light, immediately followed by a blue saucer, then a pink-red saucer.  different colored saucers lit up one by one to the left and about 3 to the right of the white light until there were about 12 total.  i just stood watching - completely dumbstruck by what was happening.  then the saucers on the right started to turn off their light one by one.  i had presence of mind to snap a picture before they all disappeared.  these saucers were not in any formation, but scattered at different heights, but all were level.  by the time i took the picture, they were tilted, as if they had moved. i ran to tell my husband and by the time i got back outside, they were no longer visible.  i was really un-nerved by this.  i am an avid sky watcher - every night, but i was so un-nerved by this event, it took me almost 3 weeks before i would look at the night sky.  when i finally got up the nerve to do so, i went to the same spot i saw the star-like light on the 27th.  there it was again, so i again decided to take a picture.  this time, 5 or 6 saucers lit up one by one, but this time they were in a straight line.  i tried snapping pics, but my hands shook too much to capture a good pic.  once again they turned off their lights one by one. the only good picture i have is the one from the 27th.  both times, i had the feeling that these saucers had been hovering for some time, before revealing themselves.  i also think that they may have been observing the naval weapons station.  i reported the sighting on the 27th to another ufo site soon after it happened, but finally i decided i should report both my sightings to mufon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike object not moving, suddenly speed away, disappear, reappear, speed back to original position, followed by 12 saucer shaped objects light up one by one.L

content.detailedDescription:
To the lower left disk shape ufo 
center round planet or ?  
to the upper right corner several spherical lights
second photo one minute apart, bright ?
content.summary: Several items on this photo

content.detailedDescription:
Took a photo and found it later on it.
was at a football game not looking for it.
content.summary: Found it after taken the photo

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my bed doing homework on my computer when a very bright light started shinning in my eyes through the window. when i got up to observe what it was, i could see two lights reflecting off of my car which was parked right in front of my window. i grabbed my camcorder and began to film the lights. one was the moon and the other was in front of it in the very top of the trees. i thought it may just be a reflection of the moon except it was extremely bright. way more bright than the moon itself. after i videoed i ran to show my roommate and her boyfriend. they watched the video with amazement so we went to see if it was still there but the object had left.
content.summary: Glowing very bright light

content.detailedDescription: Spotted the object in the sky at lunch time. i looked up to find an airliner flying over and spotted the object really far away and not moving. i was not the only witness to it. others could spot the object as well and could even photograph and video the object. the object appeared to remain stationary for the duration. it was as if there was a star in the sky in the middle of the day time even though it was noon. the object was referenced against a building and could not determine any movement or distance away from the place being observed. spotted a few other objects in the sky around the same area that looked metallic, but they only lasted roughly 2-3 seconds. the solid white dot appeared to not move. i thought the object was possibly a weather balloon but after about 20 minutes of observation, the object did not move and was not gaining in intensity or altitude.
content.summary: Visible white dot roughly a little larger than a star would be at night appearing at noon on a cloudless day

content.detailedDescription: I  notice blue lights ,3- to 4 blue lights at about a 20 degree angle on the edge.The craft moved from east to west about 800 ft off the ground,i ran to-get witness's ,then took one picture, then i went home to get better camera,came back and it was gone.
content.summary: N/a

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend was lying down and we saw it
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A flying light

content.detailedDescription: Near 8:30pm i was traveling south on rt. 2 when i noticed an extremely bright white light in the sky. it was stationary so i though a star but it was too big and too bright. then i thought a helicopter but it was in the same spot for about 20 minutes with no search light or movement whatsoever. as i drove closer to home i kept my eye on it and all of a sudden the light dimmed and then started to go crazy, pulsing a white light that was from within but also flashing smaller red and green lights randomly; nothing like the blinking lights of typical aircrafts. i was amazed that no other motorists saw this as fields nearby lent a great view since no trees were in the way. when i turned onto my road the craft went back to a single bright white light and was getting lower and moving slowly southwest in direction. i was bummed that i didn't think to pullover to take a picture earlier as trees were in my vision upon returning home. this wasn't the first time seeing this kind of light near here as it happened earlier this year more to the west near the upper malboro/waldorf area and i'm sure it won't be the last.
content.summary: Hovering bright white light changed to flashing/pulsing lights then back to white before slowly moving out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the deck about 7:45 pm saturday night gazing at the sky which is a pretty normal thing for me. i do this a lot at home due to living just south of mci airport, and down at our lake place on lake ozark because i am always on the lookout for meteors and have a 6" telescope down there where the night sky is nice and clear. i have noticed this spring / summer (new deck) that at home, we see what appears to be very bright stars appear then disappear without movement. we will typically see about 2 of these in the span of about 15 - 30 minutes if really paying attention. i always wrote this off as something like tumbling space junk catching the sun's light briefly causing a flash that lasts anywhere from 1/2 of a second to 4-5 seconds at most. sometimes they will re-illuminate a second time in the same place, but usually seem to move to another part of the sky within a few minutes. the one time i saw this that made me think twice, was when a small cloud drifted by rapidly and i was watching this light, expecting it to disappear. the cloud appeared to pass behind this object. other than this, i have never seen anything other than fireballs, meteors, satellites, and i think the iss a time or two. i typically spend about 1 solid hour per week at home gazing at the sky and 2-4 hours per weekend down at the lake just sky gazing from the comfort of a cot out on the deck.

well, this saturday is a little different. i saw an extremely bright star nearly straight up in the sky, maybe a little off to the east / southeast of center. no other stars visible yet. it was so bright that i instantly grabbed my smart phone to open the skymap to checkout which star it was, i assumed arcturus. there was nothing on the map in this area, so i plopped down on the cot so i could stare w/o fatigue. this light was intense white / blue-white and did not appear to be moving or changing brightness, but it slowly developed what looked like meteor smoke just "above" it as if it hit the atmosphere head-on rather than glancing. the "meteor smoke" was small and pretty stationary, but the light dimmed slightly and suddenly i noticed a second, more dim "star" in very close proximity. a few minutes likely passed by and i noticed a third star, seemingly all 3 shared the same light intensity as the original got more dim with the addition of the others. i thought i was witnessing a small object slowly breaking apart and coming down so slowly that there was no perceivable movement. that is, until the "meteor smoke" faded out and the 3 stars started changing brightness. about this time the sky was darkening and you could start to make out arcturus to the northwest of this event, pretty well straight up in the sky.

as i started at it, hardly blinking, i noticed that these 3 stars had turned to 6-8 dim stars in a perfect circle formation! this is when the goosebumps hit and i started feeling very hot all over, especially my back. i started hollering for my wife and son to come out. the formation broke apart to 3 single stars again, then back into formation. i never observed movement, just a sudden re-arrangement if you will. i am certain i saw a perfect circle in the sky, motionless and of equal brightness amongst the "stars" that created it. it was about the size of a half dollar if i held it out as far from my eyes as possible. by the time my wife and son came out there were only 2 stars remaining. they started to change brightness back and forth, one would get bright and the other would get dim and back-and-forth slowly and evenly, not at all randomly. after several more minutes they just dimmed out completely. this was about 8:10 pm or so. the next 15 minutes i saw two meteors and two of the super bright lights appear that i described in the beginning of this post, though they were not as high in the sky as this event and seemed unrelated. it was the first truly unexplained thing i have seen in the sky other than these stationary lights that blink out "all the time".
content.summary: meteor-like object broke into several objects that created a formation.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving at 8:10pm when we looked over to the east from the highway(91 north) and above/slightly east of the holyoke mall were 4 orange orbs in the shape of a parallelogram approximately 50-100 feet apart from one another in the sky . the objects were not moving. 


we then got off at the next exit and began to drive to the location where it appeared that they were. we got back on the highway and traced our path but did not see the objects again.
content.summary: 4 orange glowing lights in shape of parallelogram hovering above city

content.detailedDescription: Ok. i wanted to take a photo of a tree in the botanical garden in coimbra and accidentally i photographed this ufo.
content.summary: It had a conical shape

content.detailedDescription: I have been checking the skies in the wee hours because i had noticed triangular weird aircraft on a friday am about 4 months ago around 3:30am i saw unusual craft on two fridays going northward and apparently flying very low.  train passes about same time so unknown if sound was made.  took 3 photographs which show weird craft and there are strange lines throughout the pics showing heiroglyph like patterns.  the weather seemed to change in about a minute from clear to overcast.  funny but i don't specifically remember taking the photo or seeing this.  the photos weren't noticed until a few weeks later, they were found on my camera's built in memory, so this was a time i remember thinking i missed it because of no memory stick.  i was fumbling with camera trying to get a shot and couldn't see in the display what i ended up with on photos.  i lost sight probably because i ran inside to grab other camera that's about all i remember.  i wonder what these heiroglyph patterns are i haven't seen digital camera malfunctions to do such thing.  this was taken on a sony dsc-wx50 at 7x zoom with iso at 1600.  the details should be on photograph properties.  thanks!
content.summary: A ufo i photographed which seemed to cause weather to change from clear to cloudy, emitted heiroglyphs, or affected camera.

content.detailedDescription:
Date january 2014, approximately 10:00 in the evening. i looked out the 2nd story bathroom window when i saw a blinding halogen type large light that seemed to be hovering over the school across the street. at first i wondered if it was a helicopter but found that to be odd. i was stunned by its brilliance and could not look away. the light then proceeded to come slowly toward my home at rooftop level. i could not
look away although the light hurt my eyes. as the craft flew directly over my home i looked up underneath and saw two large rectangular lights one bright blue and if i remember correctly the other was red. because the white light of the craft was so blinding- even though the craft was so close to me as i looked out the window i could not make out a shape or an accurate size although i feel it was much larger than two cars.  it was so close to the roof of my home i felt very frightened. it was also so close i felt i could have thrown something at it and hit it in retrospect. 
as it passed out of my view i ran to the back of my home to look out my son's bedroom window to see it as it passed over and away from my home. i wanted my son to see it who was in his bedroom. in the time it took me to run down the hall, and look out the window, the craft had already passed over the subdivision and was as far away as the rural concession road and nothing more that a bright white light.  this suggests a change of speed because the object came quite slowly across the street and flew slowly over my home.  of course  i was upset and telling my son about what i had witnessed when he mocked me saying it was an airplane in the distance. the object just flew out of sight.

the fact i saw this object so close to me, scared me for quite a few months and it still bothers me now. i wondered why it flew so close to my roof, my home so slowly.I felt it was a ufo and felt threatened by its proximity to my home.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked out 2nd story window, saw blinding white light hovering across street, flew over my home roof top level, looked up saw colored rectangular light s underneath  flew quickly then to concession road

content.detailedDescription: We all live in a remote area of ag up in the mts. above lake lopez. we started seeing this iffel tower looking object about 2 weeks ago . always at night. sometimes there are small v like craft also. the iffeel ones look like 8 stars in a row but change configuration and as time has progressed there are more every night. tonight i count well over 25.!!!!!!!!!!! we all at first thought we were seeing things but now they come every night and it keeps growing. i thought at first it was the space station but i do not think they light it up with red and blue neon and go from a iffel tower look to a v and back. i can't believe my eyes tonight as like i said there are now at least 25 of them.
content.summary: count 26 right now looks like an iffel tower all lite up has red and blue neon and lots of white lights we a group of 7 see them a lot lately

content.detailedDescription:
Walking north in dark area with clear sky and some moonlight i observed in the northern sky three very bright orange lights orientated in a triangular shape seeming to rise into the sky starting at a 30 degree angle above the horizon and traveling in what appeared to be a vertical direction and fading from view within a minute or less.  the distance from me was impossible to determine but the lights seemed to be at an extremely high altitude.

after the group faded from view two more lights appeared in the same starting position one above the other and they too seemed to rise into the sky and then also faded from view.  i have phone video of these two lights and still pictures also.  

i am a professional airline pilot and have never seen anything like this in over 35 years of flying.
content.summary: Three bright orange lights in triangular shape rising into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Heading to work and waiting in the parking lot.

bright colors pulsating in the sky.

airplane but when closer observed it appeared to be a star until sudden movement.

bright pulsating object stationary in the sky. approximately two hours later it seemed to not have moved until the sun was rising. before being suddenly zooming forward to make an awkward turn just to disappear moments later it was stationary.

puzzled. curious. surprised and frightened.

sudden disappearance.
content.summary: Bright pulsating multi-colored object. moved in quick motion before disappearing completely.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a ufo at 9:30pm on 9/13/2014 it was a little before 9:30 pm my brother are i were going to go out in the front yard to sky watch like we always do every saturday night he went out first i was getting my stuff together to go out front and my brother ran in and told me there was a ufo outside i ran outside it was blood red it was flying west from the east it was coming toward my neighborhood i watched a few seconds then it dropped it looked like thick gobs of molten metal and sparks from it i have sen these lights do that before then it stopped and hovered for a few seconds it was silent and it was bobbing up and down and side to side then it turned and flickered from a blood red to a red orange then it started to take off wobbling but in the way it came from it was goin so slow like it has and every other ufo i seen like it has then it started to dim down and flicker and then blinked out then came back on for a few seconds then blinked out for good and im not crazy like people i tell about what i see and experience my brother sees them my mom seen it too they arent flares and no way they are chinese lanterns i seen chinese lanterns not even close but just in the last 4 or 5 months we have been seeing a big military presents in and over antioch i have seen fighter jets in formation fly over my house and black helicopters and the twin prop helicopters over antioch i would see the big helicopters from time to time and i really never see fighter jets i dont know the name of any military choppers and planes im a car guy not a plane guy but so much military i know they have to be here for the ufo's i saw 1 night a fighter jet chasing 3 of the blood red lights they flew over my house flying south once they got over the house across the street they blinked out and the jet turned off towards the east we have travis air force base not to far away im goin to keep posting on here every time i see ufos i had someone from mufon contact me but i couldnt get the whole number or the guys name it was all broken up on the message
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a red ufo at 9:30pm on 9/13/2014 i seen it for around 5 minuites then it disapeared

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) was traveling along i-94 between mattawan and kalamazoo when he noticed an orange/amber orb stationary and low to the ground, over the expressway ahead.  then he passed beneath the orb, no noise observed.  witness (a) exited the expressway at s 9th st and made some stationary observations but the orb was no longer visible anywhere in the western sky.
content.summary: Observed a stationary orange/amber orb hovering above expressway.

content.detailedDescription: Steamboat campground camping and enjoying a fire. i looked up and noticed it because it was moving without any sound and was just a steady light the same size as a star.  when i first saw it i thought it had to be a plane.  the object traveled from south to north at the speed of a plane without changing direction and about the speed if a plane.  i felt alarmed when i realized it wasn't blinking and had my husband look at it. i pointed out to my hubby that it wasn't blinking and he said that's weird. then it disappeared into a cloud and was gone. we just said to each other how weird. the object went north until a cloud passed and blocked it and we didn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Hubby and i were camping just outside of steamboat enjoying a fire. i looked up and saw a light moving across the sky from the south to the north without noise and blinking and i pointed it out to my hubby because i thought it was odd.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in the car about half a mile from home.  we were traveling westward at about 30 mph when i noticed  very bright orange light in the sky ahead of us.  we live along the flight path for the airport and i thought i was seeing the landing lights of a jet (the size and intensity of the light suggested that explanation) but the light was orange.  there were no other lights.
the object appeared to move slowly on a west to east trajectory, not unlike the jets i see flying out at night.  the object continued to move away from us and seemed to be ascending.  i stopped the car and oriented it so my wife could see the object.  we observed it for a brief time and then continued on to our home.  we saw nothing further of the light.
content.summary: Intensely bright orange light moving slowly west to east while ascending.
